pageTitle: Enough Said! - by Don @ LumberJocks.com ~ woodworking community
textBeforeTable: Show all forums View all topics Start new topic signed in to reply. You must be Have your say...show next 15 replies showing 1 through 15 of 32 replies View all replies » -- "Bordnerizing" perfectly good lumber for over a decade. Now I’ll keep ambling and muttering down the cyber-hallway. When I first saw this post and followed the link in one of my nighttime rambles, I decided to just close the door and keeping walking and muttering down the cyber-hallway, rather than sticking my head in and giving comment. But now I can’t resist. Beauty queens (and politicians) are a rarefied breed apart from the normal humans. These are the people who came up with butt adhesive to more firmly bond long dresses to their admirable backsides, so you know it’s another world than the one we occupy. The quest to win awards for beauty is something I will never understand, but having been born without
